data.title: Hvad er YouTube Vanced?
data.description:
YouTube Vanced er en modificeret version af YouTube med ekstra funktioner der gør din YouTube-oplevelse bedre!

Disse funktioner omfatter:
- Baggrundsafspilning,
- Billede i Billede (PiP), 
- Sort tema (OLED venlig),
- Annonce fjernelse (kræver aktivering),
- Tilsidesæt maksimal opløsning (tillad afspilning af video med en opløsning højere end din skærm),
- . .and meget mere!

For mere information, besøg <https://vancedapp.com>

data.title: Hvor er download-knappen?
data.description:
Selvfølgelig vil google ikke tillade en ændret version af deres egen app til at være i deres butik, så lad være med at lede efter Vanced på Google Play Butik. De apps du finder vil være falske.

Vanced apps kan downloades og installeres ved hjælp af Vanced Manager, som kan findes på vores officielle hjemmeside: <https://vancedapp.com> men du kan også få fat i det fra GitHub: <https://github.com/YTVanced/VancedManager/releases/latest>

data.title: Opdaterer YouTube Vanced automatisk?
data.description:
Nej, det den gør ikke.

Vanced Manager vil sende dig en notifikation, når der er en.

Du kan også deltage i vores [Discord Server](https://discord. g/wYrRPgv) eller følge vores [Telegram kanal](https://t.me/Vanced) for de seneste nyheder og opdaterings meddelelser.

data.title: Kan Vanced downloade videoer?
data.description:
Vanced indeholder ingen video download funktion og vil aldrig komme til det.

Mange videoer er tilgængelige til gratis download i [valgte lande](https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/6141269). I resten af verden kan du få YouTube Premium eller bruge en 3.parts downloader.

Igen, Vanced vil ALDRIG tilføje en video downloader til appen eller noget lignende.

Dette har været årsagen til lukningen af mange YouTube mods tidligere, da Google ikke kan lide folk, der downloader ophavsretligt beskyttet indhold fra deres platform, så spørg ikke om det!!!

data.title: Hvorfor virker swipe bevægelserne ikke?
data.description: Hvis du har kommentarer vist nederst (gammelt layout) i Vanced indstillinger > Layout indstillinger, deaktiver det og genstarte appen. Hvis det ikke virker, tving appen til at stoppe og ryd dens data.

data.title: Undertekster ikke tilgængelige?
data.description: Dette er ikke et problem. Ikke alle videoer har undertekster.

data.title: Modtager i donationer?
data.description:
Vi accepterer IKKE donationer!

Aller former for websteder, links eller indlæg der beder om donationer er falske.

Men hvis du ønsker at støtte Vanced udviklere, kan du downloade Brave ved hjælp af [dette link](https://brave.com/kev231) og AdGuard ved hjælp af [dette link](https://adguard.com/en/welcome.html?aid=31141).

data.title: Hvordan får man afspillerens layout til at skjule sig automatisk?
data.description: Du kan konfigurere det i YouTube Vanced Indstillinger > Tilgængelighed. Hvis indstillingerne ikke åbner eller hvis det ikke virker, skal du gå til indstillingerne for adgang til din enhed og deaktivere lydforstærker, skifte adgang, live-undertekst.

data.title: Hvorfor bruge opdelte APKer?
data.description:
Fordi:

1. Stadnard appen bruger den, så Vanced bruger den også.
2. Den installerer kun de sprog, du angiver for at reducere lagerforbruget.
3. Den har den eneste version af kerne-APK, som din enhed kræver.

Selvfølgelig kan Vanced Manager eller udviklerene konvertere det til én normal APK fil, men vi er for dovne at gøre det. Du er bare nødt til at nøjes med det vi tilbyder...

Bare rolig dog, Vanced Manager gør alt det hårde arbejde for dig, så bare tryk på `Install` knappen.

data.title: Hvorfor er farven på startskærmen forskellig fra temaet?
data.description: Startskærmens baggrundsfarve er taget fra Android frameworks farve for at sikre, at det ændrer sig efter systemtemaet. Du kan bruge Substratum/Swift temaer for at ændre farven.

data.title: Skal jeg downloade installationsfilerne igen?
data.description: Filer kan blive korrupte af forskellige årsager og kan forårsage problemer bagefter. For at undgå dette, kan du vælge at downloade dem igen for at sikre, at din installation går glat.

data.title: Hvorfor har root-versionen ikke mikrofon tilladelse?
data.description: Det har den, hvis din Vanced er opdateret.

data.title: Hvad er ExoPlayer v1?
data.description: Det er en ældre version af den aktuelle medieafspiller, der bruges af YouTube. Du får måske bedre ydeevne og stabilitet, hvis du bruger den.

data.title: Hvordan aktiveres skjulte indstillinger?
data.description: I Vanced indstillinger, tryk på 'Om' sektionene 6-7 gange for at aktivere det. Dette aktiverer kun de yderligere indstillinger for video-codec.

data.title: How to make YouTube Vanced as default app?
data.description:
As the title says, a lot of users have been asking many times how they can make YouTube Vanced as default for opening YouTube links from other apps(like browsers, messaging apps and any other app).

For root, you don't need to worry about because it is already set by default since YouTube Vanced gets replaced with Stock YouTube.

For non-root, solutions has been divided between as OneUI, MIUI and the rest.  We can't provide solutions for every OS out there, and you may need to Google it by yourself.

fields.title: OneUI users:
fields.content:
1. Tap and hold down on YouTube or YouTube Vanced app icon
2. Tap on **App info**.
3. Find "**Set as default**" and tap it
4. Tap "**Open supported links**" and choose "**Open in this app**"

In older versions of OneUI, the name of the options in the 4th step might be slightly difference. You may need to tap "**Go to supported URLs**" and choose "**In this app**" option.

fields.title: MIUI users:
fields.content:
1. Open Settings
2. Got to **Apps**,
3. **Manage apps**,
4. Then, tap the three dots at the right corner,
5. **Default apps**,
6. **Opening links**.
7. Wait until all your apps gets listed…
8. Find YouTube or YouTube Vanced and tap it.
9. Tap "**Open supported links**" and choose "**Open**"

fields.title: AOSP & other custom UIs (OOS, ColorOS, EMUI, etc.):
fields.content:
1. Open **Settings**
2. Go to **Apps**
3. Tap **Default apps**
4. Find **YouTube** or **YouTube Vanced**
5. Tap "**Go to Supported URLs**" and choose "**Open in this app**" option

If you're still troubling with this, you may need to search some "how to" articles/videos on [Google](https://www.google.com/search?q=%22android%22+how+to+open+youtube+links+with+youtube) or you can install a 3rd party app from [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/search?q=open%20with) to save you from this hassle…

data.title: Why the root variant doesn't work with microG Core?
data.description:
1. You need to have at least the [pico](https://github.com/opengapps/opengapps/wiki/Pico-Package) variant of GApps to run Vanced.

2. You can’t run Vanced with microG Core without Google Play Services Framework which is available in all GApps packages and it's a required library.

3. If you are worried about your privacy & don’t want to use GApps but still want to use watch YouTube without ads, then the [web version](https://youtube.com) is always available.

data.title: Why casting doesn't work?
data.description: For users with latest v16.16.38 non-root variant, there's a bug in upstream microG. Until that resolves, please wait for updates or roll back to v15 versions. Root users will no issues with casting if they are using Google Play Services.

data.title: What is APK Signing?
data.description:
You are reading this because you are not using Vanced Manager or you may have installed Vanced from an unofficial source.
Just use Vanced Manager!

You can safely download Vanced Manager from:
- [Official site](https://vancedapp.com)
- [GitHub repository](https://github.com/YTVanced/VancedManager/releases/latest)

data.title: Is YouTube Vanced on Play Store?
data.description:
NO!
Again, DO NOT install or even try to search for any fake apps named "YouTube Vanced" or similar on the Play Store or any app stores to install Vanced.

We only have [Vanced Guide](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vanced.faq), and it's the only official app published on Play Store.

If you find any other app with our icon and name, report it as impersonation and give it a bad review.

Our apps can only be found at [official site](https://vancedapp.com).

data.title: Why is Vanced not showing up in home screen or app drawer?
data.description:
You are reading this because you are not using Vanced Manager or you may have installed Vanced from an unofficial source.
Just use Vanced Manager!

You can safely download Vanced Manager from:
- Official site <https://vancedapp.com>
- [GitHub repository](https://github.com/YTVanced/VancedManager/releases/latest)

data.title: Why aren't videos playing?
data.description: Try restarting the app. It might also because of your internet connection or your device.

data.title: Why am I having the 480p limit?
data.description: Due to the COVID-19, Google is restricting data usage of several countries. This happens on the server and affects both Vanced and stock YouTube users.

fields.title: Workarounds:
fields.content:
1. Connect to a VPN of a different region.
2. Use the [web version](https://youtube.com)
3. Since the 480p restriction is only for phones and not tablets, you can change the device model in YouTube Vanced to overcome the restriction.

#### How to change the device model?
1. Open YouTube Vanced.
2. Go to Settings
3. Tap the `Vanced Settings`
4. Enable hidden settings:
  - Scroll down and tap on the `About` section till you get a message saying `Hidden settings enabled`.
5. Go to `Codec override`
6. Set manufacturer to `Samsung` and model to `SM-T865`.
7. Restart the app.

After restarting, the 480p limit should be gone.

data.title: How to hide the microG notification?
data.description:
To hide microG the notification,

1. You can disable battery optimization for Vanced microG and reboot your device.

2. If the above method doesn't work, disable microG notifications by holding on to the notification, toggle it off and tap Save.

>Disabling app notifications can be done in different ways depending on the Android user interface. If you don't know how to disable it, try using Google for learning how to disable it.

data.title: Does 1440p look better on my 1080p screen?
data.description:
Yes, but only if the video ratio is something like 18:9, 21:9, ... You can enable `Stats for nerds` in Settings > General to confirm it.

To enable higher resolutions, go to Vanced settings > Video settings and turn on `Max resolution` then restart the app.
